definition: lit. windswept and battered by rain/to undergo hardship (idiom)
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: It is because of you, make me afraid to expose to wind and rain.
sentences.chinese: 正是因爲你，使我不怕風吹雨打。

sentences.english: The wind blows, the rain drops.
The weather-beaten ship is riding to an anchor in the bay.
sentences.chinese: 這艘飽經風吹雨打的船在海灣中停泊着。

sentences.english: This type of home can last through more than 100 years of wear and tear.
sentences.chinese: 這種房子能經歷上百年的風吹雨打。

sentences.english: We were buffeted by the wind and the rain.
sentences.chinese: 我們連續受到風吹雨打。

sentences.english: Alone outside in the wind and rain, all I want is to go back home.
sentences.chinese: 獨自在外面風吹雨打，真的想要回家。

sentences.english: He was exposed to wind and rain.
The trunk of the old tree is slightly inclined, after being buffered by wind and rain for many years.
sentences.chinese: 歷經多年的風吹雨打，老樹的軀幹有些傾側了。

sentences.english: Especially of note is one elderly man who regardless of wind or rain is out there every single day.
sentences.chinese: 特別是一位老年人不管風吹雨打每天都在那兒。

sentences.english: How come they persisted in that despite rain, storms, and sunburn?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼他們能夠堅持，哪怕風吹雨打與暴曬？

sentences.english: Rock that has been ground down by the elements becomes soil.
sentences.chinese: 由於風吹雨打日曬而崩裂的岩石化成了土壤。

sentences.english: Our feelings after all the rain and wind, couldn't help eventually break down.
sentences.chinese: 我們的情感畢竟禁不住那風吹雨打，終極決裂。

sentences.english: The paint is chipped and falling off the weather - beaten house.
sentences.chinese: 油漆已從那飽經風吹雨打的房子上剝落了。

definition: scorched and drenched by sun and rain (idiom); suffer from exposure to the elements/weather-beaten
(idiom) to be exposed to the elements
howling wind and torrential rain (idiom)/(fig.) difficult, dangerous situation
to be clogged up/to be congested (traffic, computer network etc)
all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
